type ConfigurationElementCollection = class inherit ConfigurationElement interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示一个配置元素，该元素包含子元素的集合。

span.span: Represents a configuration element containing a collection of child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示配置文件中的元素的集合。The represents a collection of elements within a configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 配置文件中的某个元素引用一个基本的 XML 元素或部分。An element within a configuration file refers to a basic XML element or a section. 如果有，一个简单的元素是具有相关属性的 XML 标记。A simple element is an XML tag with related attributes, if any. 简单元素构成了一个部分。A simple element constitutes a section. 复杂的部分可以包含一个或多个简单的元素、 一系列元素，以及其他部分。Complex sections can contain one or more simple elements, a collection of elements, and other sections. 您使用若要运行了一系列对象。You use the to work with a collection of objects. 实现此类来添加自定义集合元素与。Implement this class to add collections of custom elements to a . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用。The following example shows how to use the . 第一个示例由三个类组成： `UrlsSection`，`UrlsCollection`和`UrlConfigElement`。`UrlsSection`类使用来定义自定义配置节。The first example consists of three classes: `UrlsSection`, `UrlsCollection` and `UrlConfigElement`.The `UrlsSection` class uses the to define a custom configuration section. 本部分包含 URL 集合 (由定义`UrlsCollection`类) 的 URL 元素 (由定义`UrlConfigElement`类)。This section contains a URL collection (defined by the `UrlsCollection` class) of URL elements (defined by the `UrlConfigElement` class). [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.configuration.configurationelementcollection/cs/customcollectionsection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.configuration.configurationelementcollection/vb/customcollectionsection.vb#1)] 此第二个代码示例使用前面指定的类。This second code example uses the classes specified before. 您将合并这两个示例控制台应用程序项目中。You combine these two examples in a console application project. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.configuration.configurationelementcollection/cs/usingconfigurationcollectionelement.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.configuration.configurationelementcollection/vb/usingconfigurationcollectionelement.vb#31)] 运行控制台应用程序的实例时`UrlsSection`创建类并在应用程序配置文件中生成以下配置元素：When you run the console application, an instance of the `UrlsSection` class is created and the following configuration elements are generated in the application configuration file: ```xml

para.span: 可以使用编程方式或声明性的 （特性化） 编码模型来创建自定义配置元素。

span.span: You can use a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element.

para.span: 编程模型要求为每个元素的属性创建属性来获取和设置其值，并添加到的基础的内部属性包基类。

span.span: The programmatic model requires that for each element attribute you create a property to get and set its value, and that you add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class.

para.span: 声明性模型，也称为特性化模型，可以通过使用属性并将其配置与属性定义元素属性。

span.span: The declarative model, also referred to as the attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and configuring it with attributes.

para.span: 这些属性指示 ASP.NET 配置系统有关的属性类型及其默认值。

span.span: These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values.

para.span: ASP.NET 可以使用反射来获取此信息创建的元素属性的对象并执行所需的初始化。

span.span: ASP.NET can use reflection to obtain this information and then create the element property objects and perform the required initialization.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于设置要使用的比较器。The is used to set a comparer to use. 例如，不区分大小写的比较器可用于使密钥不区分大小写。For example, you can use a case-insensitive comparer to make the key case insensitive.

summary.span: 在派生的类中重写时，向 实例添加 。

span.span: Adds a to an instance when overridden in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将添加一个新到集合。Use the method to add a new to the collection. 在派生类中重写，如果添加元素时，所需自定义行为。Override in a derived class if custom behavior is required when the element is added. 添加元素时，只有键相同而值不同的元素才被视为重复元素。When adding, an element is considered a duplicate only if the keys are identical but the values are different. 键和值都相同的元素将被接受并且不给出提示，原因是这些元素不会相互竞争。Elements with identical keys and values are accepted silently because the elements do not compete. 但是，无法添加键相同而值不同的元素，因为无法从逻辑上确定哪个竞争值有效。However, an element with an identical key but a different value cannot be added because there is no logic to determine which of the competing values should be honored.

- Override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当添加重复的元素时，引发异常元素的值是或。When you add a duplicate element, an exception is thrown if the value of the element is either or . 请注意，使用相同的密钥和值的元素不被视为重复项，以静默方式接受。Note that elements with identical keys and values are not considered duplicates, and are accepted silently. 使用相同的密钥，但不同的值的唯一元素将被视为重复项。Only elements with identical keys but different values are considered duplicates. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分方法。For more information, see the Remarks section for the method.
